hibernate-mapping.query: FROM ApprovalStatus approvalStatus WHERE approvalStatus.user =:user AND approvalStatus.customer =:customer AND (approvalStatus.startDate <= :dateStart) AND (approvalStatus.endDate >= :dateEnd)
FROM ApprovalStatus approvalStatus WHERE approvalStatus.customer in (:customers) AND (approvalStatus.startDate <= :dateStart) AND (approvalStatus.endDate >= :dateEnd)
